titlestmt.titleproper: Asian Arts Medium Format Photograph Collection
Asian Arts Medium Format Photograph Collection

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:08

did.unittitle: Asian Arts Medium Format Photograph Collection
did.abstract: Collection of medium format mounted black and white and color reproductions of Asian arts. Content varies from original photographic prints to reproductions from magazines and other published sources. Some sections have accompanying clippings folders.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code), or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Asian Arts Medium Format Photograph Collection, Arts Library, Yale University

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: These materials are stored offsite at the Library Shelving Facility. For access to the materials, please make a request at the Art & Architecture Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged by country or region. The country or region is further divided by medium and chronological period. Individual artists listed, if known.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection of medium format mounted black and white and color reproductions of Asian arts. Content varies from original photographic prints to reproductions from magazines and other published sources. Some sections have accompanying clippings folders.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes a folder of miscellaneous clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes a folder of miscellaneous clippings.
